sentence: Speaker, I ask my colleagues to join me in paying special tribute  to the life and service of Orval Mullen.
title: Special Recognition of the Life and Service of Orval Mullen

sentence: Speaker, it is with a great deal of pride that I rise  to pay a very special tribute to an outstanding high school football  team in Ohio's 5th Congressional District.
title: Recognizing St. Henry High School on Winning the Division VII State Football Championship

sentence: Speaker, I ask my colleagues to join me in paying special tribute  to Major General John Harris, on his retirement from the Ohio National  Guard.
